Yandex Disk.name: P16.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that the transmission of user communications is encrypted by default?

Yandex Disk.name: P16.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that transmissions of user communications are encrypted using unique keys?

Yandex Disk.name: P16.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that users can secure their private content using end-to-end encryption, or full-disk encryption (where applicable)?

Yandex Disk.name: P16.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that end-to-end encryption, or full-disk encryption, is enabled by default?
